lead_paragraph: An article on Aug. 22 about Oguchi Onyewu, an American soccer player who recently joined A.C. Milan in Italy’s famed Serie A, misstated the number of years it has been since the team won its last major trophy. It was two years ago, not three. (A.C. Milan won the European Champions League final in 2006-7.).
